title: OU Health Physicians — Infectious Disease Clinic
author: Student Preauthorization Documents
description: No matter your age or stage of life, you can trust the healthcare professionals at OU Health. Learn about the infectious disease services provided at this location.
cleaned_text: OU Health Physicians — Infectious Disease Clinic Handicap Access OU Health Physicians — Infectious Disease Clinic 1000 N Lincoln Blvd. Oklahoma City, OK 73104 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Hours subject to change. Please call (405) 271-6434 for confirmation.
